        public Piece selectPiece​(Coordinate coordinate)
        Get the piece at the given board coordinate
        Parameters:
        coordinate - The (x, y) coordinate of the board to get a piece from
        Returns:
        The piece if there is one, null otherwise

      • checkMoves

        public java.util.List<Move> checkMoves​(Coordinate coordinate)
        Get all valid moves for a position
        Parameters:
        coordinate - The coordinate of the piece to check moves for
        Returns:
        A list of Move objects representing all possible moves for the piece at the given coordinate

      • getCurrentBoardState

        public Piece[][] getCurrentBoardState()
        Get the current array representing the board state
        Returns:
        A 2D arraie of Piece objects representing the current state of the game

      • checkWinCon

        public User checkWinCon()
        Check to see if there is a winner
        Returns:
        The user who won the game, Null if nobody has won yet
